Class PolygonIntersector

  • java.lang.Object

      • isPointInsideEdge

        private static boolean isPointInsideEdge(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 point,
                                         com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 edgeStartPoint,
                                         com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 edgeEndPoint)
        Informs if a given point is inside a given edge.
        Parameters:
        point - The point that will be analyzed.
        edgeStartPoint - The Edge's starting point.
        edgeEndPoint - The Edge's ending point.
        Returns:
        True, if the point is inside the edge, false otherwise.

      • getEdgesIntersection

                                                                  com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 secondEdgeStartPoint,

        Finds the point were two Edges intersect.
        Parameters:
        firstEdgeStartPoint - The first edge's starting point.
        firstEdgeEndPoint - The first edge's ending point.
        secondEdgeStartPoint - The second edge's starting point.
        secondEdgeEndPoint - The second edge's ending point.
        Returns:
        The point were the two Edges intersect.
